original_text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David's sons were chief rulers.
korean_text: 여호야다의 아들 브나야는 그렛 사람과 블렛 사람을 관할하고 다윗의 아들들은 대신들이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호야다의 아들 베냐는 그렛 사람들과 블렛 사람들 다스렸고

sentences.original_text: and David's sons were chief rulers
